title: Social Movie
subtitle: Aplication that you can search and see movie details
learning: Page's management with react router, make fetch requests from a external API, styling with styled components, pagination, component reuse, folder and code organization, besides the improvement of the quality of my code.
stacks: Vite, React, React Router, Typescript, Styled Components and React Loading Skeleton.

title: L'originale Order Pizza
subtitle: A project that allows the employees of a Pizzeria to make pizza orders and delete.
learning: Use Firebase Auth for user authentication, storing and querying data using Firebase Firestore, page management with React Router, styling with TailwindCSS and UI creation with Figma.
stacks: Vite, React, React Router, Typescript, Firebase Auth, Firestore, TailwindCSS and Figma.

title: Clothes E-commerce
subtitle: A clothes E-commerce that allows you to add products to the cart
learning: State management using Context API, styling with TailwindCSS, Local Storage to store cart items and applied Typescript concepts: Types Aliases, Generics, Calls Signatures and manipulation of types.

title: Chapada Diamantina Website
subtitle: Responsive website with contents about the Chapada Diamantina.
learning: Page management, CSS effects and responsiveness.

title: E-commerce Landing Page
subtitle: Clothes E-commerce landing page made with HTML and CSS

title: Tech Fitness Landing Page
